about_the_game:
Welcome to the thrilling world of "Survival for Treasure", an immersive survival game where you will face hordes of zombies in order to reach your goal.

You will play as a brave adventurer who volunteered to explore a zombie-infested island in search of a safe filled with money. Your mission will be to navigate through various zones of the island, locate the safe, and retrieve the money as quickly as possible, before safely returning to your starting point. Be vigilant, as zombies lurk around every corner, seeking to eliminate you. You will need to equip yourself with weapons and useful items, devise clever strategies to evade zombie attacks, and successfully locate the precious safe within the given timeframe.


!!!! Warning !!!!

Please note that the game may contain some bugs, as it has been developed by a single person. We kindly ask for your understanding and encourage you to report any issues you may encounter, so that we can address them. We are committed to continuously improving the game to provide you with the best possible experience. Thank you for your support!

content_descriptors.notes: This work contains scenes of realistic violence, with the presence of blood and gore involving zombie-like creatures, as well as a certain amount of nudity.

name: Survival for Treasure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x86 and x64
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 (2048 MB) or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Welcome to the world of "Survival for Treasure," an exciting survival game where you must face hordes of zombies to reach your goal.
